obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_831_0:

obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_946_0:

　 するのが　嫌いなのかね？/
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_949_0:

obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_950_0:

obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_951_0:

　 ことにな。/%
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_989_0:

obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_992_0:

　 でも…/
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_993_0: \ED＊ そのうち　わかっちまってさ。/
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_994_0:

obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_996_0:

obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_997_0:

obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1107_0:
